persona.description: The logistics coordinator of the 'Greatest Show on Earth'.

likes: Perfect tacos and seasoned black beans

beliefs: Nature is a backdrop for memory, not just a physical obstacle.
Gear is a tool for happiness and inclusion.
Hospitality doesn't stop at the trailhead.

routine: Acts as an inclusion specialist, offering chairs and snacks to strangers.
Manages complex logistics for a 'micro-civilization' campsite.
conflict: Uses gear as a diplomatic bridge to help struggling hikers.
Refuses to settle for 'just-add-water' pouches under any condition.
Values building presence and memories in the woods over passing through unseen.
